What if you run with tcmalloc? sudo apt-get install google-perftools export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4"
…

What if you run with tcmalloc?

sudo apt-get install google-perftools
export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4"
…

body:
What if you run with tcmalloc?

sudo apt-get install google-perftools
export LD_PRELOAD="/usr/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4"


On Mon, May 8, 2017 at 7:53 AM, Fayez <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Just re-compiled with TF_NEED_JEMALLOC environment variable set to 0,
> memory usage is the same (i.e. equal to the compiled version with jemalloc
> enabled).
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/9742#issuecomment-299889130>,
